user.title: Alternative Time Systems v2.5
user.description:
Welcome to Alternative Time Systems!

This integration will automatically discover all available calendar modules.

On the next screens, you can select which time systems to enable, organized by category.

category_technical.title: Technical & Modern Time Systems

data_description.enable_decimal: French Revolutionary time: 10 hours, 100 minutes per day
data_description.enable_hexadecimal: Day divided into 65536 parts, displayed in hex
data_description.enable_swatch: Internet Time in Beats @000-@999. One day = 1000 beats

category_historical.title: Historical Calendar Systems

data_description.enable_maya: Long Count, Tzolk'in and Haab calendars
data_description.enable_egyptian: Ancient Egyptian civil calendar with 365 days
data_description.enable_roman: Ancient Roman calendar with Kalends, Nones, and Ides

category_cultural.title: Cultural Calendar Systems

data_description.enable_suriyakati: Thai calendar with Buddhist Era (BE = CE + 543)

category_military.title: Military Time Systems

data_description.enable_nato_zone: Full military DTG: DDHHMM[Zone] MON YY

category_space.title: Space & Astronomical Time Systems

data_description.enable_darian: Mars calendar with 24 months and 668 sols per year

category_scifi.title: Science Fiction Time Systems

data_description.enable_eve: EVE Online New Eden Standard Time

category_fantasy.title: Fantasy World Calendars

data_description.enable_shire: Hobbit calendar from Lord of the Rings
data_description.enable_rivendell: Elvish calendar from Lord of the Rings
data_description.enable_tamriel: Elder Scrolls calendar with moons and Daedric days

category_uncategorized.title: Other Time Systems
